name: breakfast
description: brɛkfəst. noun. a meal eaten in the morning, the first of the day.

name: lunch
description: lʌn(t)ʃ. noun. a meal eaten in the middle of the day, typically one that is lighter or less formal than an evening meal.

name: dinner
description: ˈdɪnə. noun. the main meal of the day, taken either around midday or in the evening.

name: dessert
description: dɪˈzəːt. noun. the sweet course eaten at the end of a meal.
